quickview.showQuickviewHelpText: When clicking on product-related blocks, the Quickview is displayed instead of the detail page.

scrollNavigation.title: Scroll navigation
scrollNavigation.anchorTitleHelpText: The navigation points are displayed in the storefront as a navigatable list of available sections.
scrollNavigation.invalidDisplayNameLengthMessage: At least one of your active navigation points has no name. | The name of this navigation point exceeds the maximum length of 255 characters: "{truncatedName}"
